name: Product revenue
notes: Sales of tangible products (US GAAP: product revenue)

name: Service revenue
notes: Sales of services (US GAAP: service revenue)

name: Subscription revenue
notes: Subscriptions, SaaS and other recurring service revenue

name: Other operating revenue
notes: Miscellaneous operating revenue not classified elsewhere

name: Rental revenue
notes: Rental and leasing revenue from operating activities

name: Sales returns and allowances
notes: Reductions of revenue for discounts, returns and allowances (negative amounts)

name: Net revenue
notes: Net operating revenue after discounts, returns and allowances

name: Cost of goods purchased
notes: Purchased goods held for resale (inventory purchases)

name: Direct materials
notes: Purchased raw materials and components used in production

name: Direct labor
notes: Direct labor costs directly attributable to production

name: Manufacturing subcontracting
notes: Amounts paid to third parties for manufacturing or production

name: Inventory adjustments (COGS)
notes: Inventory change impacting cost of goods sold (negative if inventory increases)

name: Other cost of goods sold
notes: Other costs of goods sold related to materials and supplies

name: Inbound freight and shipping on purchases
notes: Inbound freight and shipping related to purchased goods

name: Warehousing & distribution (cost of sales)
notes: Warehousing and distribution costs directly tied to cost of sales

name: Production supplies & packaging
notes: Packaging, labels and production-related supplies

name: Manufacturing overhead
notes: Production-related overhead costs (indirect manufacturing costs)

name: Product handling & delivery (cost of sales)
notes: Delivery and handling costs for goods sold (cost of sales)

name: Royalties & production fees
notes: Royalties and licensing fees tied to product sales

name: Warranty costs (COGS)
notes: Estimated costs of warranties and after-sale guarantees

name: Marketplace selling fees (Amazon/Shopify etc.)
notes: Online marketplace and platform selling fees linked to product sales

name: Other direct costs (cost of sales)
notes: Other direct costs directly related to production and sales

name: Cost of goods sold (COGS)
notes: Total cost of goods sold

name: Gross profit
notes: Revenue minus cost of goods sold (gross profit)

name: Salaries; wages & benefits
notes: Salaries, wages, bonuses, employer payroll taxes and benefits

name: Contractors & subcontractors (OpEx)
notes: External consultants, freelancers and subcontracted services (operating expenses)

name: Advertising & marketing
notes: Advertising, promotion and marketing expenses (including digital marketing)

name: Office expenses & supplies
notes: Office supplies, small equipment and general office-related expenses

name: Rent & lease expenses
notes: Rent and lease expense for offices, retail space and warehouses

name: Utilities
notes: Electricity, water, heating, internet and telecom services

name: Professional & consulting fees
notes: Legal, audit, accounting and other professional service fees

name: Insurance
notes: Insurance premiums for business, property and liability coverage

name: Travel; meals & entertainment
notes: Business travel expenses, lodging, meals and related costs

name: Vehicle expenses
notes: Fuel, maintenance, insurance and other vehicle-related operating costs

name: Bank charges & payment processing fees
notes: Bank charges, merchant fees and other payment processing fees

name: Bad debt expense
notes: Expense related to doubtful accounts and expected credit losses

name: General supplies & miscellaneous operating expenses
notes: Miscellaneous operating expenses and supplies not classified elsewhere

name: IT & cloud subscriptions
notes: IT services, software licences, SaaS and cloud subscriptions

name: Repairs & maintenance
notes: Repairs, maintenance and cleaning for premises and equipment

name: Other operating expenses
notes: Other operating expenses not classified in the categories above

name: Depreciation & amortization
notes: Depreciation and amortization of property, plant & equipment and intangible assets

name: Total operating expenses
notes: Sum of all operating expenses included in operating income

name: Operating income
notes: Operating income before interest and income taxes (EBIT)

name: Interest and other financial income
notes: Interest income and other financial income

name: Interest expense and finance costs
notes: Interest expense, financing costs and related loan charges

name: Foreign exchange gain (loss)
notes: Unrealized and realized gains or losses on foreign currency transactions

name: Other financial gains (losses)
notes: Other financial gains or losses not classified elsewhere

name: Net financial result
notes: Net result of financial income and expenses

name: Income before income taxes
notes: Income before income taxes (pre-tax income)

name: Current income tax expense
notes: Current period income tax expense

name: Deferred income tax expense
notes: Deferred income tax expense (or benefit)

name: Other income tax expense
notes: Other income tax-related expenses and adjustments

name: Total income tax expense
notes: Total income tax expense (current, deferred and other)

name: Net income
notes: Net income for the period after income taxes
